title: Italy : market share of coffee pods and capsules 2014 - 2018 , by segment
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 3 lines denoting Family, Office, and HoReCa. The y axis indicates the Market Share and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Family, Office, and HoReCa are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Family, 2. Office, and lastly, 3. HoReCa.
Overall across the Year, Family mostly maintained the highest Market Share when compared to others with a mean value of 69.82, and it peaked at 2018.
Followed by Office which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 25.8 Market Share,reaching its highest point  at 2014 with a value of 27.4.
HoReCa mostly had the least Market Share with a mean value of 4.4, which peaked at 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 with a value of 4.4.
